steps.task: Find out which type of product the user wants to build from the list [website, webApp, mobileApp, desktopApp].
Find out what information is needed before building the $product_type and make a bullet point list, save to an empty dictionary with user_id.

inputs.name: $product_type
inputs.description: The type of product the user wants to build.

steps.task: Check the user message. If the user message answers any of the information keys in the $information_dictionary, fill up the corresponding value in the dictionary.

inputs.name: $information_dictionary
inputs.description: An empty dictionary with user_id and a list of needed information as bullet points.

inputs.name: $updated_information_dictionary
inputs.description: The dictionary with potentially filled in values from the user message.

steps.task: Pause the plan run and trigger a clarification plan.

inputs.name: $dictionary_full
inputs.description: Indicates if the dictionary is full or not.
